name: Sylpheo
description:
Sylpheo is a Salesforce Appexchange Program Partner. creates apps that help companies increase productivity, efficiency and mobility. Our apps and services help companies to know more, target better, work faster, follow up easier - and seriously boost efficiency. We create custom applications to meet specific business needs. And because we build applications on Force.com, they integrate natively with Salesforce CRM.
Solutions that we've create for clients include: Write That.Name, Chatter to NAO, The Official Board for Salesforce, Invested...
Sylpheo is a Salesforce Appexchange Program Partner and Cloud Alliance Partner. ﻿ ﻿
